description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The sequal to the Never Ending Game.  The Never Ending Game 2 is a ball drop game with power ups, high scores, and more.  Try out the all new customization menu.  Customize your wheel which affects different aspects of your ball.
description.short: The sequal to the Never Ending Game.  The Never Ending Game 2 is a ball drop game with power ups, high scores, and more.  Try out the all new customization menu.  Customize your wheel which affects different aspects of your ball.
